name: Rabbit Rancher (Gnomebrew)
description:
Play Now!

Hey Rancher!

Get ready to round up some rabbits and breed them to harvest their Easter Eggs! They're mischievous little critters though, always getting in the way. Don't worry, you can pick them up and throw them where you want. They won't stay there for long though.

Enjoy the wide range of color combinations possible when selecting breeding pairs. And here's a weird hint about these rabbits... their genes get more unstable with each new generation! Luckily, mutated bunnies have a higher chance of producing the best Easter Eggs.

How many carrots can you earn?

Thanks for taking the time to enjoy our game.

Special Thanks:

Kyle Breslow - Programming

Megan Breslow - Artist

Sláinte - Music
